sections.heading: relay system, defined.Telecommunications relay system means a service permitting full and simultaneous communication between deaf, hard of hearing, or speech-impaired persons using specialized telecommunications equipment and other persons using conventional telephone equipment

sections.text:
86-311.Telecommunications relay system, defined.

Telecommunications relay system means a service permitting full and simultaneous communication between deaf, hard of hearing, or speech-impaired persons using specialized telecommunications equipment and other persons using conventional telephone equipment.

SourceLaws 2002, LB 1105, ยง 189.
